He is absolutely the  best doctor in my neighborhood. 
Very patient to answer all your questions, knowledgable and professional. 
Highly recommend.
Yes, Dr. Hanjis is attentive, kind and patient. He will stick around to answer any of your questions.

Smart physician attentive and a good listener.   He seems very busy as I am waiting for my blood appointment information so I can get my blood work and be sure all is in order on my meds. Also a bit of a long wait for my annual examination.

reviewDetails.comment: Calm, willing to listen, great demeanor, also happy to answer questions.  Practical, grounded advice.  Really appreciate it

Dr. Ehrmann is not my normal PCP, but he saw me as I was ill.  He was quite thorough, answered my many questions, and I didn't feel rushed.  I was taken on time and was in and out of the office in less than 45 minutes, testing included.  I would look to see Dr. Ehrmann again without reservation if my PCP was unavailable.
He listens, reads my chart before coming in, suggests options and makes it clear what the next steps are for him and for me. And he truly follows through. Wonderful doctor.

DR Ehrman is a wonderful primary care provider. He is professional, compassionate, friendly and has empathy for his patients.
He is on top of all the details and shows genuine concern. i would recommend to everyone.

hospitalAffiliations.name: New York Presbyterian Hospital Weill Cornell Medical Center

reviewDetails.comment: Good doctor.  Spends time and listens.
She is thorough, efficient, and all around great
She is friendly, listens and provides honest feedback!
She listened to my questions and concerns with empathy and helped with a suggested course of action. Would definitely recommend!

Dr. Greenwald is calm, compassionate, and caring.  She listens well and responds clearly.  Although MD appointments are often hurried affairs, she addresses all the issues without rushing the patient out of the room.
She really cares about her patients and is a very genuine and caring professional.
Great doctor - listens without any judgement and provides caring medical advice.
Dr Greenwald is a professional and kind physician.  She is sensitive to the needs of her clients and is very knowledgeable about her field.

reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Schwartz is thorough and very attentive to patient’s needs. He is also very time efficient as I didn’t have to wait long at all until I was seen.

Dr Schwartz is a wonderful doctor.  He has literally save my life on 2 separate occasions. He is an "old school" doctor and I love that.  If you have an issue regarding your lungs he will diagnose it and help you to handle  it.  He is through, attentive and  LISTENS to his patience. I have been with him about 10 years now and I am very happy I found him.
He is a good doctor
Kind and thorough. Took time to understand my concerns, in and out of the office quickly after a detailed checkup.
He’s fabulous! Takes his time with you, explains everything. Thorough. Very nice, decent gentleman. I have recommended him to friends and they think he’s great too!

reviewDetails.comment: Gave me a good examination assessed my health issue. Gave me an exercise handout Suggested specialists to see about my condition.
Excellent experience with Dr Lascalea - very attentive and personally followed up after the appointment to ensure I was getting necessary care with specialist.
Great doctor, very personable and always takes the time to ask the right questions. Would highly recommend him!
Dr. Lascalea was very thorough, clear and has a very reassuring manner.  I would definitely recommend him to others.
Dr Lascalea is extremely competent  and personable. He has been my PCP for more than 10 years now. I trust him completely.
I would recommend any colleagues to visit Dr. Lascalea, just because he's knowledgable and takes the time to discuss any questions that you may have. Great person!

He is attentive to detail, thorough, compassionate, with s great
Bed-side manner
He’s a great doctor. He’s very interested in your well-being.
Dr. Lascalea was great, understanding and friendly.

schools.name: New York Univ Sch Of Med

reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Foont immediately sets you at ease, but is also clearly a very competent practitioner. I would recommend her wholeheartedly.

Dr. Foont is thoroughly professional and at every visit I have felt immediately at ease. She is very willing to listen to your medical issues and counsel you on the best solution. Dr. Foont also has a very holistic approach to health and so is happy to advise on an appropriate way to approach any other health issues that concern you, outside her area of expertise. I am very happy to recommend Dr. Foont to anyone!
She is very smart, listens to your questions, is thorough, and is pragmatic.

Dr. Julie Foont is an exceptionally knowledgeable professional who believes in plain-spoken dialogue that puts a patient at ease. She is supported by a practice team that handles every step of engagement in a friendly and efficient manner. I’ve insisted my husband engage Dr. Foont in his care, and he couldn’t be happier.

Frankly, I wish Dr. Foont was our GP. The peace of mind being in her care would be the greatest gift! If she leaves New York, we’ll have no choice but to follow her!
She spent time with me to figure out a lifelong IBS problem and ruled out anything more serious  that previous tests thought indicated something more serious like Chrons.
Really enjoyed Dr. Foont! Very kind and great bedside manner.
